ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Race to 60 (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... *whew* I am glad someone said that. I am in my guild because I know for a fact that when I log in it will be greeted with a chat-box full of Hi Tszaaz!
ygData.messageBody:
>If you aren't getting from a guild what you want, then you should
>leave. All the better if its to a guild which will give you what you
>want/need.


*whew* I am glad someone said that. I am in my guild because I know for a
fact that when I log in it will be greeted with a chat-box full of "Hi
Tszaaz!" followed by several hours of verbal harassment and merciless
character assasination as well as incidental grouping with people I know
aren't foos, or at least aren't foos in some new surprising manner. As you
might guess we have some high-40s and one or two 50+ but the rest are
totally random collections of races/classes. When I find a guild with more
jerks I MIGHT be tempeted, but I will have less dirt on em than I do these
yahoos, so I will probably stay.

I guess it just depends what you want from the game, but there IS always a
choice here, about how you want to play, I am just glad the game is so r0x3n
without all that, erm, intruige and politics I see in the Uber-guilds.

Tszaaz E'Taurguin, Soi Disant Gentry, Povar
